content_html: As the curfew and restrictions in Kathmandu Valley were lifted, long lines of people formed at petrol pumps. These individuals had come out for essential work as soon as the rules were relaxed. The crowds and congestion at the pumps increased starting Friday morning because of the large number of vehicles.

These individuals had come out for essential work as soon as the rules were relaxed. The crowds and congestion at the pumps increased starting Friday morning because of the large number of vehicles.

title: Long Lines at Petrol Pumps as Curfew Lifts
